Name: Joey and Penguin's 2 Player Adventure
About the game: Are you tired of cooperative multiplayer games that really skimp on the cooperation? Then this just might be the adventure you're looking for. Pass a magic water balloon between yourself and a friend to hit bad guys and collect items. Working together is not only recommended, it is ESSENTIAL! Penguin the penguin has been framed for a certain crime and has gone on the lam. His bestie, Joey the monkey, is determined to prove his innocence! Embark on a quest for the truth that is filled with magic, mystery and mayhem! *The finest in local co-op *Intense 4 player battle mode *A single player option with a unique control scheme *Full cheesy, hilarious voice acting *Leaderboards for score-chasers and speedrunners *Tons of unlockables: cards, music, cheats, and more!
